issue.title: [Python] Investigate alternatives to timestamps_to_ms argument in pandas conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-622](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-622). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As we add more implicit type coercion options, the approach of adding keyword arguments may add a lot of implementation complexity. Let's think about if there's a better way to handle this that meets the requirements of e.g. Parquet 1.0 file support
